list.output: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint sign_confirm from Authentiq API.

list.description:
Revoke an Authentiq ID using email & phone.

If called with `email` and `phone` only, a verification code 
will be sent by email. Do a second call adding `code` to 
complete the revocation.
list.output: I need to revoke an authentiq id using email & phone. Please help me with that.
